1100100010100010 1101010000110010 1 -> sum: 1001110011010101, cout: 1
0010011001110011 1111000110010100 1 -> sum: 0001100000001000, cout: 1
1010011111000001 1101100110000101 0 -> sum: 1000000101000110, cout: 1

0001100000011100 0110100010100001 1 -> sum: 1000000010111110, cout: 0
1100101111110100 1011101110101000 1 -> sum: 1000011110011101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
